channel.title: German Elections on Hugo Toscano
channel.description: Recent content in German Elections on Hugo Toscano

item.title: German Elections in the 21st Century
item.description: In this blogpost, we will come back to the subject of the German Elections. We will try to show, mostly visually, the changes in election results during the 21st century. Thus, we will use data from the elections in 2002 to the last ones in 2017. The main focus will be mapping the results of the parties represented in the current Bundestag (German Parliament) during this time span. Letâ€™s start our coding.
